column1: Table A-96:  Emission Factors for CH4 for Alternative Fuel Vehicles (g/mi)

Note: When driven in all-electric mode, plug-in electric vehicles have zero tailpipe emissions. Therefore, emissions factors for battery electric vehicle (BEVs) and the electric portion of plug-in hybrid electric vehicles (PHEVs) are not included in this table.
Source: Developed by ICF (Browning 2017) using ANL (2020).
